item.title: EVEROLIMUS
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db01590
DrugCentral: everolimus
Synonymous :40-o-(2-hydroxyethyl)-rapamycin | 42-o-(2-hydroxyethyl)rapamycin | everolimus | évérolimus


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of everolimus gene in 5 abstracts.

pmid sentence
19909234 Thus the introduction of new biologic drugs like vorinostat, bortezomib, everolimus and temsirolimus, in the treatment of MPM finds a strong rationale.
22223868 This article describes several ongoing or recently completed phase II and III trials using novel agents vorinostat, everolimus, CBP501, MORAb-009, NGR-hTNF, WT1 vaccine, bevacizumab, cediranib, and thalidomide.
22427958 Metformin and an mTor inhibitor, Everolimus, effectively suppressed nanotube formation.
25611229 We evaluated the activity of everolimus, an oral mammalian target of rapamycin inhibitor, in patients with unresectable MPM. […] MPM patients who had received at least one but no more than two prior chemotherapy regimens, which must have been platinum-based, were treated with 10 mg of everolimus daily. […] Everolimus has limited clinical activity in advanced MPM patients. […] Additional studies of single-agent everolimus in advanced MPM are not warranted.
25952930 This study aimed to identify ‘druggable’ pathways in MPM and to formulate a targeted approach based on the use of commercially available molecules, such as the multikinase inhibitor sorafenib and the mTOR inhibitor everolimus. […] Sorafenib and everolimus combination was effective in mTOR and ERM blockade; exerted synergistic effects on the inhibition of MPM cell proliferation; triggered ROS production and consequent AMPK-p38 mediated-apoptosis. […] ERM and mTOR pathways are activated in MPM and ‘druggable’ by a combination of sorafenib and everolimus.
